title: Suspended

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I just got suspended today, i am so upset cause i play this game everyday and i didnt realise how toxic i was untill i was shown my chat logs, i guess you could call this a wake up call for me but id really like my account unbanned as it is the holidays and there is nothing else to do. i have over 200 dollars worth of new zealand money on my account so id really apreciate if i can get un suspended, just this once thanks :)

replies.body: It wouldn't be "just this once" though. You are given the same treatment as everyone else, the amount of money or time you spend on the game is irrelevant. You broke the rules, either more than once or very severely to have been issued a 14 day ban, and these are the consequences you have to face for that. Take it as a lesson and try to be better in future.

Well ive had a few chat restrictions and thats all,  i was medium toxic in 3 games, like saying 'wtf' everytime i died and saying 'you're garbage' in all chat but dont think its worth a 2 week suspension

The punishments issued in this manner follow tiers, those being 10 game chat restriction, 25 game chat restriction, 14 day ban and then, and was mentioned in your reform card the next punishment is permanent suspension of your account.

You can, with consistent good behaviour over a long enough period of time get your account back into good standing. For the average player with a 10 game chat restriction this will take about 3 months. Being on a 14 day ban it will take a lot longer, and ANY negative behaviour in the meantime, whether you are punished for it or not, will only extend that time.

In cases like these it is not so much a matter of severity (sever behaviours will skip punishment tiers) as it is consistency. You have been consistently negative, despite being warned twice previously in the form of your chat restrictions. 

This 14 day ban is your third and final warning, and is meant to be some time away from the game for you to reflect on your behaviour and resolve to make it better. I will be very clear, just as the reform card was, if you continue this behaviour once your 14 day ban ends your account WILL be permanently suspended.
the thing is ive seen the leaverbuster say to me 'good job on improving your behavior', 1 week later they send me a suspension?!?

LeaverBuster is a separate system, so it's "good job" refers only to your AFK/leaving behaviour. That aside, even if you were doing better, you'd have to be doing better on a more permanent basis than a week to avoid further punishment.
Oh well, take these two weeks to learn not to be toxic or what would cause these bans.

This really is how riot and tencent operate. They dont care about the player base any more than they can make a buck off you and so they changed the xp for new accounts causing more smurfing and to increase overall spending on the game. They dont just temp ban people from ranked, which is where almost all of the raging happens. 
Half of the player base is toxic and the other half are over sensitive whingers. 
I got told I was being toxic in an aram for civilly pointing out that our sej was building pure ap and hiding at the back and trying to just ks by last second diving and saying that wasnt good teamwork and suggesting some tanky items and peel. So trying to promote teamwork is toxic and 2 people, the sej and another player said they would report me for being toxic. 
Wait for the ban to be over, mute everyone in every game you play, stay out of flex where you often get ganged up on by duos and trios and never put more money into the f2p game would be my advice.
Dont worry, NZ $ arent worth all that much anyway with trump at the wheel.
